sentences.en: "Well!", said the innkeeper, drawing herself up indignantly.
sentences.cn: “行！”客栈老板娘挺直身子愤然说道。

sentences.en: A man who runs a rooming house or an inn; an innkeeper.
sentences.cn: 这个酒馆的老板出名地凶狠,不准 手下人 犯一点错误.

sentences.en: Although the innkeeper was warm, we guessed that his real goad was to get more money.
sentences.cn: 尽管客栈老板很热情, 但我们猜想他的真正目的是为了得到更多的钱.

sentences.en: An innkeeper is a person who an inn.
sentences.cn: 客栈老板就是经营客栈的人.

sentences.en: Pinocchio gave the innkeeper one gold coin and ran outside.
sentences.cn: 皮诺奇给了客栈老板一枚金币后,就跑了出去.

sentences.en: Shelley and Byron were the sons of aristocrats while Keats was the son of an innkeeper.
sentences.cn: 雪莱和拜伦是贵族子弟，而济慈只是一个旅馆老板的儿子。

sentences.en: The death of the innkeeper still remains a mystery.
sentences.cn: 客栈老板之死仍然是个谜.
这个酒馆的老板是个完美主义者.

sentences.en: The innkeeper is a very friendly middle - aged woman.
sentences.cn: 客栈老板是位非常友好的 中年 妇女.

sentences.en: The innkeeper is liable to criminal prosecution, because the man died inside the inn.
sentences.cn: 旅馆老板面临刑事起诉, 因为那个人就死在他的旅店里.

sentences.en: We must reckon with the innkeeper before leaving Paris.
sentences.cn: 离开巴黎前,我们必须先与旅馆老板把账结清.

sentences.en: With a merry laugh, Victor called out to the innkeeper , " What's the damage, old fellow? "
sentences.cn: 维克多乐呵呵地笑了一声, 朝小旅店的老板喊 道 :“老朋友,该付多少钱? ”

trans.tran_en: someone who owns or manages an inn
